subject: Re: Hosting invoice
preview: Hi Steve,  Thank you so much for sending these through — really appreciate it!

full_threads.body:
Hi Steve,

Thank you so much for sending these through — really appreciate it!

attached dns from cloudflare.

-

Steve Castrisos
Partner

+61 432 079 227






62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008

Hi Steve,

Just checking in to see if you’ve had a chance to export the Cloudflare records yet. Once we receive them, we’ll be able to complete the updates on our end.

Really appreciate your help with this and thanks again for taking care of it.

Hi Steve,

Just following up to check if you’ve had a chance to export the Cloudflare records yet. We’d love to get them so we can move forward with the updates on our end.

Thanks again for your help with this!

Hi Steve,

Thanks so much for taking care of this, really appreciate your help.

We’ll wait for the exported records and update things on our end once they’re through.

I think it would be better to remove it off Cloudflare as the account will also close soon - I'll export records.

I thought you'd have control of the DNS records from a domain level and adjust accordingly.



-

Steve Castrisos
Partner

+61 432 079 227






62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Steve,

Not yet. Can you please delegate access to cloudfare for

Support@wolfiq.com.au

We're currently attempting to transfer.

Thank you!

Sent from my iPhone

On 2 Sep 2025, at 8:03 am, Melissa Gordon <melissa@banditdesigngroup.com.au> wrote:

﻿
Hey Yads,

I would just hold off until WolfIQ confirms they have successfully accessed Crazy Domains and have transferred your hosting over.

Thanks so much,
Mel


Melissa Gordon

Account Manager

+ 61 402 776 113

Suite 1, Level 2, 105 Crown Lane,
Darlinghurst NSW 2010
@banditdesigngroup

banditdesigngroup.com.au

past, present and future.


On Mon, Sep 1, 2025 at 5:04 PM Yadira Galarza Cauchi <yadscauchiskin@gmail.com> wrote:
I'm assuming no, not yet as they can't get in?

Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: Steve Castrisos <steve@chisel.productions>
Date: 1 September 2025 at 3:18:45 pm AEST
To: Yadira Galarza Cauchi <yadscauchiskin@gmail.com>
Subject: Re: Hosting invoice

﻿
Hi Yads,

Happy Monday! As it's September 1 today and you mentioned the hosting would move / be taken over I am just confirming I can decommission the server your website use to be on now?
-
Steve Castrisos
Partner
+61 432 079 227
62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008
On 29 Aug 2025 at 2:43 PM +1000, Steve Castrisos <steve@chisel.productions>, wrote:
Ok no problem. I will check in on Monday and make sure it's safe to remove the site from hosting.

-
Steve Castrisos
Partner
+61 432 079 227
62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008
On 29 Aug 2025 at 2:39 PM +1000, Yadira Galarza Cauchi <yadscauchiskin@gmail.com>, wrote:
Yes. Bandit have advised to move everything over so it's streamlined. I let them know it needed to be done by Sept 1, which they've ok'd!

On Fri, Aug 29, 2025 at 2:01 PM Steve Castrisos <steve@chisel.productions> wrote:
Sorry can you confirm what you mean?

Are they taking over hosting on Monday?
-
Steve Castrisos
Partner
+61 432 079 227
62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008
On 29 Aug 2025 at 13:59 +1000, Yadira Galarza Cauchi <yadscauchiskin@gmail.com>, wrote:
Hi Steve,

Just quickly confirming my host is changing to Wolf IQ for maintenance, and they will be implementing, by September 1.

Please let me know if I need to do anything with you from your end?

On Mon, Aug 18, 2025 at 11:43 AM Steve Castrisos <steve@chisel.productions> wrote:
Hi Yads,

Yes, we're winding down the development side of the business, but that doesn't affect hosting - you're welcome to keep the site where it is if you'd like.

Your next hosting invoice is due on September 1.

If you'd prefer to transfer, that's no problem. It would be great if you could complete the move before the next billing cycle so there's no overlap.
-
Steve Castrisos
Partner
+61 432 079 227
62 Ivy Street, Darlington NSW 2008
On 18 Aug 2025 at 4:45 AM +1000, Yadira Galarza Cauchi <yadscauchiskin@gmail.com>, wrote:
Hi Steve,

I was just wondering when my next hosting invoice with you is due?

The girls at Bandit have told me you're phasing out the development side of your business so we'll be transferring hosting. However, I just don't want to double up re. billing.

Could you let me know please?

Thank you,
